channel.title: Resources on We use computers to combat climate change.
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on We use computers to combat climate change.

item.title: Data
item.description: Multi-scale, high-resolution, and high-fidelity climate simulations The dataset is simulated by WRF4.3 by ERA5 (3 domains) and GCM 6 hourly (4 domains) forcing in NSCC HPC All output is daily netcdf files with equal area projection at three domains (12.5 km: Southeast Asia; 2.5 km: Southern Malay Peninsula; 500 m: Singapore) Files include names with wrfout_d01_year-mon-day_00:00:00 (first running) and wrfout_d01_year-mon-day_03:00:00 (restart running) Every file has 8 timesteps (0, 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, 21; or 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, 21, 0) Due to the restart running,there are one or more files named by the same day.

item.title: Tutorials
item.description: Jupyter Book for Python Climate Visuals https://github.com/XiaogangHe/python-climate-visuals
